General.Name: NovAccess Global Inc
General.Description: NovAccess Global Inc., a biopharmaceutical company, develops novel immunotherapies to treat brain tumor patients in the United States. The company specializes in cutting-edge research related to utilizing a patient's immune system to attack the cancer. NovAccess Global Inc. was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Chagrin Falls, Ohio.
General.Address: 8834 Mayfield Road, Chesterland, OH, United States, 44026
